nodes.text: Thune was a planet located in Wild Space. From space, it looked like a brown and blue orb. Its capital, Thune City, was entirely built on canals. A variety of sentient species could be found on Thune, including Bith, Grans, Hutts, Ithorians, Jablogians, Klatooinians, Mon Calamari, Onodones, Rodians, Sullustans, Twi'leks, and Wookiees.
At some point, the young siblings Milo and Lina Graf traveled to Thune with Dil Pexton, the best friend and agent of their missing parents.
